job_details.degree_required: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent.

jd: From: Roshan, Vyzeinc roshan@vyzeinc.com Reply to: roshan@vyzeinc.com Job Title: Java Full Stack Developer Duration: 6+ Months Location: McLean, VA (Onsite from Day 1) Work Authorization: USC/H4 EAD/H1B (Trusted Third Party) Mode of Interview (MOI): Skype Passport Number: Mandatory Mandatory Requirements: 8+ years of experience in the design and development of applications using Java 8+/J2EE, Spring, Spring Boot, RESTful Services, and UI Frameworks. 2+ years of experience in designing and developing Microservices using Spring Boot and REST API. Strong expertise in ORM frameworks such as JPA or Hibernate. Solid understanding and hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes. 2+ years of experience with UI frameworks like Angular or ReactJS. 1+ year of experience designing and implementing cloud-based solutions with various AWS services (e.g., EC2, IAM, S3, Lambda). Proficiency in RDBMS/PostgreSQL. Extensive experience with DevOps tools such as Jenkins, Artifactory, Maven/Gradle, and Git/Bitbucket. Strong knowledge of technical concepts like Security, Transaction, Monitoring, and Performance. Nice to Have: Experience with OAuth implementation using Ping Identity. Familiarity with API Management (e.g., Apigee) and Service Mesh (e.g., Istio). Experience with the ELK stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana). Experience with Queue-based implementations. Knowledge of NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB). Proficiency in scripting languages like Unix or Python. Soft Skills: Quick learner of new technologies and tools. Ability to work independently and contribute to the success of projects. Participate in discussions to understand the application design and help deploy applications in target environments. Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent. AWS Certification is preferred but not mandatory.
